build-type.name: Update triton version to latest master

parameters.param: #!/bin/bash set -e cat ~/.ssh/id_rsa.pub echo %system.build.vcs.number.QtAutomotive_Components_HttpsGitLfsQtIoGerritTritonUiGit% git clone git@git.pelagicore.net:uxteam/meta-qtas-demo.git git clone git@git.pelagicore.net:uxteam/qtas-demo-manifest.git cd meta-qtas-demo FILENAME="`find ./ -name triton-ui_git.bb`" test -f "$FILENAME" sed 's/SRCREV *= *".*"/SRCREV = "%system.build.vcs.number.QtAutomotive_Components_HttpsGitLfsQtIoGerritTritonUiGit%"/' -i "$FILENAME" git commit -m "Updated triton-ui to latest master" "$FILENAME" git log |head -n 15
